code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import Markdown from"react-markdown";import postlist from"../posts.json";import"./components.css";var PostList=function PostList(){var excerptList=postlist.map(function(post){return post.content.split(" ").slice(0,20).join(" ")+"...";});return React.createElement("div",{className:"postlist"},React.createElement("h1",{className:"title"},"All Posts"),postlist.length&&postlist.map(function(post,i){return React.createElement("div",{key:i,className:"post-card"},React.createElement("div",{className:"img-container"},post.thumbnail&&React.createElement("img",{className:"thumbnail",width:80,src:post.thumbnail,alt:""}),React.createElement("h2",{className:"post-title"},React.createElement(Link,{className:"links",to:"/post/".concat(post.id)},post.title))),React.createElement("small",null,"Published on ",post.date," by ",post.author),React.createElement("hr",null),React.createElement(Markdown,{source:excerptList[i],escapeHtml:false}),React.createElement("small",null,React.createElement(Link,{className:"links",to:"/post/".concat(post.id)},"Read more")));}));};export default PostList;
